The Arizona Tax Credit Program is one of the best ways that parents and community members can help our school. This program helps schools fund extracurricular programs and activities through tax-deductible donations. Couples filing jointly can contribute $400, while individuals can contribute $200.

Your contribution results in a dollar-for-dollar reduction in the actual income tax you owe the State of Arizona. Our district uses this income to fund many of our programs, clubs, and activities in our school. Students directly benefit from the Tax Credit program.

Find out how to contribute here: https://www.salomek8.org/School_Tax_Credit
